title: Splunk security advisory (AV25-489)
description: On August 6, 2025, Splunk published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Splunk AppDynamics On-Premises Enterprise Console  versions prior to 25.4.0
Splunk AppDynamics Cluster Agent  versions prior to 25.6.0
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
